title: Nova Scotia declares state of emergency  identifies   more cases of COVID     CTV News

content: HALIFAX    Nova Scotia Premier Stephen McNeil has officially declared a state of emergency in the province due to the COVID   pandemic Effective   a m  Monday  the borders of Nova Scotia will be tightened  with screening processes at all points of entry     chars
